title: So i'm in a normal draft game...
body:
our third pick takes Heimer support after I lock in Nocturne top.

Our 5th pick complains about being the worst ADC, yada yada.

I offer him Nocturne if he would grab me MF, and we would switch.

"I don't have MF"

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

It's a normal game and she's free this week.

So, since I don't wish to suffer the clearly inevitable loss, I dodge.

Trying to get above 50% win rate in normal draft games, but needing to dodge players like this is NOT helpful.
